snippet.title: Swift: How to Display Time in Social Media Apps
snippet.description:
In today's brief video, we'll discuss and implement a simple algorithm that captures the amount of time an event occurred in the past.  We'll be using an Extension on Date and applying some clean up logic to make our code easy to maintain. 

Hopefully you guys will find this simple exercise helpful.

Enjoy.
